is_in_hs_app.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the HubSpot app.

is_in_editor.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within any content editor.

is_in_global_content_editor.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the global content editor.

is_in_theme_editor.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the theme editor.

is_in_page_editor.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the page editor.

is_in_blog_post_editor.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the blog post editor.

is_in_email_editor.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the email editor.

is_in_previewer.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within any preview context.

is_in_theme_previewer.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the theme previewer.

is_in_template_previewer.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the template previewer.

is_in_page_previewer.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the page previewer.

is_in_blog_post_previewer.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the blog post previewer.

is_in_email_previewer.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the email previewer.

is_in_module_previewer.description: Returns true if content is being rendered within the module previewer.
